name: MDK
notes: Game resolution can be changed with nglide_config.exe

files.setup: N/A:Select the game's installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's installer provided by GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/MDK/MDK3DFX.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui /suppressmsgboxes
    executable: $setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
